isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Mounting Engine on Engine Stand - Mounting Engine Stand Bracket and Engine - Service Procedure

step1.para: Remove engine from vehicle. Lift engine from factory installed lifting eyes using a minimum three ton rated chain hoist equipped with safety hooks.

Install the bottom square plate on the Engine Stand
and tighten two grade 8 M16 bolts to standard torque .

Match Engine Stand Bracket
holes with bolt holes in the exhaust side of the crankcase and install nine Class 10.9 M8 bolts.
Tighten nine M8 bolts to standard torque.
Raise or lower the engine to the approximate height of the Engine Stand .
Install two grade 8 M16 bolts through the bottom square plate and Engine Stand Bracket. Install two M16 nuts on bolts and finger tighten.
Install the top square plate on the Engine Stand and loosely install two grade 8 M16 bolts.
Install two grade 8 M16 bolts thought the top square plate and Engine Stand Bracket. Install two M16 nuts on bolts and finger tighten.
Tighten eight M16 bolts to standard torque.
Slowly release tension from engine hoist.
Remove hoist safety chain hooks from engine lifting eyes.
